gui.nochatreport.secureChat: This option cannot work with No Chat Reports, since there are no signatures to verify.
gui.nochatreport.noReporting: Chat reports are disabled on this server, courtesy of No Chat Reports.
disconnect.nochatreports.client: This server does not have No Chat Reports, and you have it configured to require itself on server.
gui.nochatreports.status_secure: This server has No Chat Reports installed, or prevents your messages from being reportable in some other known way. You can chat safely.
gui.nochatreports.status_unintrusive: This server does not prevent chat reports, but allows unsigned messages from the mod No Chat Reports. Messages can still be reported to Microsoft Studios, but are less likely to have action taken on them.
gui.nochatreports.status_insecure: This server demands all player messages to be signed and you proceeded with the warning. Everything you send to the chat can be reported to Microsoft Studios. You can manually remove this server from NoChatReports.json in your config folder to get warned again.
gui.nochatreports.status_unknown: No Chat Reports could not evaluate safety of this server. This should never happen, please report it as a bug to the mod developer.
gui.nochatreports.unsafe_server.contents: This server is configured to demand your public key, and all your chat messages to be signed, which means they can be reported to Mojang ('enforce-secure-profile' is likely enabled in server.properties). You can choose to play anyways, but No Chat Reports will not be able to protect you.
gui.nochatreports.unsafe_server.check: Do not show again for this server
